context.rdfs:comment:
A reservation for lodging at a hotel, motel, inn, etc.

Note: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations.
context.rdfs:label: LodgingReservation

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of children staying in the unit.
properties.rdfs:label: numChildren

properties.rdfs:comment: A full description of the lodging unit.
properties.rdfs:label: lodgingUnitDescription

properties.rdfs:comment: Textual description of the unit type (including suite vs. room, size of bed, etc.).
properties.rdfs:label: lodgingUnitType

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of adults staying in the unit.
properties.rdfs:label: numAdults
